dict.acceptation: 烦扰，打扰；使…不安，使…恼怒；使迷惑；烦恼；
麻烦，操心；累赘；烦扰，吵闹；讨厌的人；

sent.orig: One day, Aqiao thought of her bother: "Why don't ask my bother to come here too?"
sent.trans: 一天，阿巧想她哥哥了：“为什么不让哥哥也来这里呢？”

sent.orig: Kate, does it bother you, and Mike, does it bother you.
sent.trans: 凯特，这是否会困扰到你，以及迈克。

sent.orig: "I am sorry to Bother you, But the lavatory drain is Blocked . "
sent.trans: 对不起打扰您，但是盥洗室的排水管堵塞了。

sent.orig: Each of these factors, on its own, would not bother Mr Bashir much.
sent.trans: 所有这些因素，单独地，都无法撼动巴希尔先生多少。
